description.displayText: We hired Carrie to pick up our two daughters (11 and 7) from two different schools, bring them home, and prepare dinner for them and my father. She worked with us for the full school year. During that time, she was literally never late once. I am not always on top of the school schedule (breaks, days off), but I had given Carrie the school calendar at the beginning of the year so she would often remind me when they had a day off, etc. And if there was a last minute change (kids returning late from a school trip, etc), she was very flexible and always accommodated us. She is very concerned about safety, enforced 'street crossing' and phone-use-while-walking rules that we had set up. She's also very sweet. My younger daughter is taking ballet lessons, so Carrie taught her how to practice her splits and other moves. I'm a big fan and highly recommend her!

She is very concerned about safety, enforced 'street crossing' and phone-use-while-walking rules that we had set up. She's also very sweet. description.displayText: Carrie N. has worked for me for the last three (3) years to present. She performs housekeeping duties and occasionally run errands picking up my dry cleaning, groceries and drugstore needs. She walks the dog and occasionally baby sits an 11 year old daughter when she visits. She shows consistent stability, is reliable and does a great job.

She performs housekeeping duties and occasionally run errands picking up my dry cleaning, groceries and drugstore needs. She walks the dog and occasionally baby sits an 11 year old daughter when she visits. She shows consistent stability, is reliable and does a great job.

description.displayText:
Carrie has been our babysitter for 2 years.She watched our sons ages 8 & 10 after school until 8 PM.She also took care of our sons during days when they were home from school sick.She made sure they made it to their after school programs and helped them get started with their homework.She worked half days for us during the summer.
 In addition to babysitter she helped put books on line to sell on to websites.I own an internet business selling books and records & CD's.She worked part time before our sons were out of school.
 We have recently relocated to our new home in NJ otherwise she would be working for us now.
Carrie is a very well rounded,intelligent and sweet person and we were lucky to have her.We are sorry to lose her due to our move.She added a lot to our lives.The kids miss her.
 Thank you Wolfgang R.
